title: Passing the know-how along
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Employees - Training of
description: Provides some ideas for the experienced worker to help and guide and new worker in their job. Analyse and plan your instructions; select key points where real skill is required and stress these points; show how to do it; let the person watch you do it again; let them do the simple parts of the job; help with do the whole job with constructive advice; let them do the whole job but watch; put them on their own. Adapted from a bulletin of the Training within Industry Section of the Office of Production Management entitled "Helping the experienced worker to break in a man on a new job". A National Defence film.
